name: Alec Bradley - Tempus Nicaragua - Magnus
additionalNotes: Nicaraguan tobacco is known to be some of the heartiest tobacco in the world. But, to get the true flavor from the leaves, you need to have patience. With Tempus Nicaragua, Alan created a stout cigar, well-balanced and flavorful â€“ something an enthusiast would take the time to enjoy and remember. Tempus Nicaragua is a cigar that will wake you up in the morning or enhance your experience after enjoying a great meal.
